title: User Story: Abuse
content:

> "Things are rough at home. Walking on eggshells constantly. Anyone know of any resources for emotional abuse?"

**Option 2 (Sharing Experience):**

> "He always said he was 'joking,' but the constant put-downs chipped away at me. I finally left. It's possible to escape."

**Option 3 (Raising Awareness):**

> "Gaslighting is real and it's insidious. Don't let anyone tell you your feelings aren't valid. You deserve better."
reason: While not explicitly stating intent for self-harm or suicide, the text indicates emotional distress and possible abuse at home, which can escalate to higher risk if unaddressed.
